title: From Oakmont Regional to Harvard University (Podcast)
itunes:title: From Oakmont Regional to Harvard University (Podcast)
description:
Michael Barr and Mike Lynch sit down with Harvard University athletic director Erin McDermott. We talk about what it’s like to switch jobs during a pandemic, how her on the court experience influences her new role and the many “hats” a modern athletic director must wear.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
